name: Mid-Morning Focus
description: Peak focus time. The talk segments are brief and don't break concentration. This is the show for people who need background noise that stays in the background. Fewer requests read out, more music.

presenters.notes: Mix of duo and solo, minimal interruptions, respect the focus time

tone.mood: Focused, respecting concentration time, minimal chat

sample_lines: That was 'Focus Mode' requested by Claire. Claire, we hope you're in the zone.
Coming up: three tracks in a row, no interruptions. You're welcome.
Brief intro, long track. That's the format.
That was 'Deep Work Vibes'. Next up, more of the same.

handover.style: Quick, efficient handover respecting the focus vibe

winter.tone_adjustment: Reference shorter days affecting energy, darker mornings to midday

summer.tone_adjustment: Reference nice weather outside, temptation to not work

christmas_period.tone_adjustment: Acknowledge reduced work, people taking time off
christmas_period.notes: Keep it minimal, some people still working

ai_budget.notes: 25% talk = 45 minutes = 2700 seconds of TTS maximum, 75% music = 135 minutes
